303125.<pc>とリナーシェの到着から\nしばらく遅れて セーリアと 大量の荷物を抱えた:
Some time after the arrival of <pc>
and Linashe, Celia and Prince Odis arrived at
Lane Village with a large amount of luggage.

303126.「それでは やはり\n このレーンの村は リナーシェ様の……。: So, I guess this Lane Village is Linashe's.

303127.「ええ。かつての コルレーン王国の領地です。\n あれから ６００年も経つのに\:
Yes, it is. This is the former territory of the Kingdom of Col Lane. Six hundred years have passed since then, and not a bit of the
beauty of my homeland's waters has changed.

303128.「この場所で ピクニックだなんて\n とても すてき。\n ありがとう セーリア:
It's so nice to have a picnic here. Thank you
Celia Prince Odis.

303129.「セーリアが よく 話していたんです。\n リナーシェ様に 現代の\n ヴェリナ:
Celia used to talk about it. She would like
Linashe to try a modern Verinard meal.

303130.「はい。私たちが 毎日\n おいしい ご飯を食べられるのは\n リナーシェ様の:
Yes, it is thanks to Linashe that we can eat delicious food every day. It is because of Linashe that we are able to eat delicious food
every day.

303131.「現代のお食事は すごいのですよ。\n 私が生まれた ３００年前には\n なかっ:
Modern cuisine is amazing. There are many
dishes that did not exist 300 years ago, when
I was born.

303132.「まず サンドイッチは いかがですか？\n 手でつまめるし 具も種類豊富だし\n:
How about a sandwich? You can pick it up with your hands, there is a wide variety of ingredients, and above all, it tastes better
when eaten outside.

303133.「こちらの お魚のパイも 絶品ですよ。\n サクサクの生地と 下味の効いた お魚:
This fish pie is also excellent. The crispy
dough and the well-seasoned fish go very well
together.

303134.「バーベキューは串を持って そのまま\n お肉に かぶりつくのが おすすめです！:
I recommend that you hold the skewer and bite
into the meat as it is on the barbecue!

303135.「まあ お肉 大好きです<heart>\n わたくしの時代では あまり\n 食べ:
Well, I love meat <heart>, although it wasn't eaten
very much in my time.

303136.「一般的に ウェディは 魚を好みますからね。\n ４００年前の 大陸間鉄道 開通:
Weddies generally prefer fish. Their diet has
changed considerably since the opening of the
intercontinental railroad 400 years ago.

303138.「リナーシェ様。\n 後学のために あなたが 王だった時代の話を\n 聞かせては:
Dear Linashe. For the sake of posterity, may I
ask you to tell me a story from when you were
a king?

303140.「わたくしにも あなたたちの話を\n 聞かせてくれる？\n もちろん お食事を:
Would you like to share your stories with me?
While we enjoy our meal, of course.

303141.「ふたりとも 今日は 本当にありがとう。\n とても 楽しい時間を 過ごせました:
Thank you both so much for today. We had a
very enjoyable time.

303142.「オーディス王子。３００年の掟を破り\n 王となるのは あなたが 想像するよりも:
Prince Odis, breaking a 300 year rule and
becoming king will be a much more difficult
path than you can imagine.

303143.「けれど あなたの つねに上を目指す熱意と\n 教えを乞える素直さは すばらしい:
But your enthusiasm to always aim higher and
your openness to learn from others are great
talents. Please be a good king.

303144.「リナーシェ様……。\n はい。僕は かならず……王になります！\n なってみせ:
Dear Mr. Linashe. Yes, I will be king! I will
definitely be king! I will become king!

303145.「セーリア。\n オーディス王子の 家族として\n 王子を となりで支えてあげて:
Celia, as a member of Prince Odis' family, you
should support him by his side.

303148.「あの ふたり……なんと\n もどかしくて かわいらしいのでしょう！\n 応援し:
How frustratingly cute those two are! It makes
you want to cheer for them.

303149.「<pc>さまは どなたか\n 好きな方が いらっしゃいますか？\n<selec:
Do you have anyone you like, <pc>?

303150.「まあ……まあ まあ まあ！\n それはすてき！ あなたと その方の幸せを\n:
Well, well, well! That's lovely! I sincerely
wish you and the gentleman every happiness!

303151.「恋愛だけが 人生では ありませんものね。\n 申し訳ありません。ウェディの性か:
Love is not the only thing in life, is it? I'm
sorry, but I guess it's Weddie's nature, I'm
not a fan of love stories.

303152.「まあ うれしい。\n わたくしも <pc>さまが 大好きです<heart>: Well, I'm happy. I too love <pc><heart>

303153.「………………。:
The following is a list of the most common
problems with the

303154.「<pc>さま。じつは わたくし ひとりで\n ヴェリナード城に行く 自信がなか:
<pc>. I was not confident about going
to Verinard Castle by myself. I had a hard
time there.

303155.「だから あなたを 頼りました。: That's why I relied on you.

303156.「<pc>さま。わたくしは……\n 英雄に選ばれて よかった。\n 今は 本当に:
<pc>. I'm glad I was chosen to be a
hero. That's what I really think now.

303157.「ああ それにしても 海が綺麗です。\n ずっと 見ていたいけれど\n そういう:
Oh, by the way, the ocean is beautiful. I wish
I could see it all the time, but that's not an
option, is it?

303158.「あの……<pc>さま。\n もう少し ここにいて いいですか？\n もう少しだ:
Um, <pc>. Can I stay here a little
longer? Just a little bit more, so I can...

303159.それから リナーシェは\n何も言わず 海を ながめていた……。:
Then Linashe stared out at the sea without
saying a word.

303160.「……ありがとうございました\n <pc>さま。\n そろそろ 天星郷に 戻りま:
Thank you <pc>. It's time to get back
to Heaven.
